text: Já trabalhei com algumas tecnologias até o momento. No front end com JavaScript e React, e neste último, utilizei ferramentas como React Hooks, Context API, Redux e React Testing Library(RTL). Já no back end, utilizei as linguagens JavaScript e TypeScript por meio do Node.js. Utilizei contêineres, banco de dados relacionais, MySQL/Sequelize e criei APIs com Express, fazendo uma aplicação em camadas em um sistema análogo à Model, View e Controller(MVC). Por último, mesmo que superficialmente, utilizei a programação orientada à objetos(POO), utilizando os príncipios do SOLID.
frontText: Experiência com  React.js, React Hooks, Context API, Redux e React Testing Library(RTL)
backText: Experiência com Node.js, MYSQL, Express, TypeScript e POO
designText: Experiência com ferramentas como Photoshop e ibisPaint

text: I've already worked with some technologies. In front end, with JavaScript and React. In the latter, I also used other tools like React Hooks, Context API, Redux e React Testing Library(RTL). In back end, through Node.js I worked with JavaScript and TypeScript. I already worked with containers, relational databases, MySQL, Sequelize and created APIs with Express, making applications in layers in a system analog with Model, View and Controller(MVC). Even superficially, I used the object-oriented programming(OOP), using SOLID principles.
designText: Experience with tools like Photoshop and ibisPaint

text: 今まである技術はもう用いました。フロントエンドに、JavaScriptとReactを用いた。それに、他の技術も使いました、例えば: React Hooks、context API、 Redux、 React Testing Library (RTL)。バックエンドに、 Node.jsでJavaScriptもTypescriptをプログラミングしました。また、コンテナ、関係データベース、MySQL、、Sequelizeなどを用いました。Express通じて、APIを作りました。アップリはレイヤーのModel-View-Controller/モデル・ビュー・コントローラ (MVC) があった。表面上けど、オブジェクト指向プログラミング(OOP) 、SOLIDの原論を従いました。
